src_original: iyam itthan-nāmā bhikṣuṇī dvādaśa-varṣā aṅgopetā |
tgt_original: 比丘尼某甲，受大戒來滿十二歲，欲畜眾。

src_original: sā saṃgham upasthāpanā-saṃmutiṃ yācati |
tgt_original: 某甲已從僧乞畜眾羯磨。

src_original: yadi saṃghasya prāpta-kālaṃ saṃgho itthan-nāmāye bhikṣuṇīye dvādaśa-varṣāye aṅgopetāye upasthāpanā-saṃmutiṃ dadyāt |
tgt_original: 若僧時到僧忍聽，僧當與某甲畜眾羯磨。

src_original: ovayikā eṣā jñaptiḥ |
tgt_original: 如是白。

src_original: tasyā itthan-nāmā ca itthan-nāmā ca antevāsinīyo upasaṃpādyāyo |  viśuddhā bhikṣuṇīhi |  tāsām ihāgacchantīnāṃ tasmā(syād)  brahmacaryāntarāyo |  so (sā)han dharmadinnā bhikṣuṇī itthan-nāmāya ca itthan-nāmāya ca antevāsinīnām upasaṃpādyānāṃ tatrasthitānām iha-sthitaṃ saṃghaṃ upasaṃpadaṃ yācāmi |  upasaṃpādetu tāyo saṃgho mayā itthan-nāmāya upādhyāyinīya |
tgt_original: 我某甲，因和上尼某甲，求受具足戒。 我某甲，今從僧乞屬和上尼羯磨，和上尼某甲。 僧當與我某甲作屬和上尼羯磨，和上尼某甲。

src_original: 79. yaṃ kālaṃ dharmadinnāya yācitaṃ bhavati |  tato dūtopasaṃpadā-pratigrāhakehi yācitavyaṃ |  vandāmy ārya-saṃghaṃ |
tgt_original: 尼戒師應僧中作如是唱「大德尼僧聽！

src_original: iyan dharmadinnā bhikṣuṇī tasyā itthan-nāmā ca itthan-nāmā ca antevāsinyo upasaṃpādyāyo |
tgt_original: 某甲，因和上尼某甲，求受具足戒。

src_original: tāsām ihāgacchantīnāṃ syāt brahmacaryāntarāyo |  tāhi itthan-nāmāya ca itthan-nāmāya ca dharmadinnāya upādhyāyinīya tatrasthitāhi iha-sthitaḥ saṃgha upasaṃpadaṃ yācitaḥ |  upasaṃpādetu tāyo āryo saṃgho |  ullumpatu tāyo āryo saṃgho |  anukampatu tāyo āryo saṃgho |
tgt_original: 某甲今從眾僧乞屬和上尼羯磨，和上尼某甲。 若僧時到僧忍聽，我今僧中問某甲無遮道法。

src_original: evaṃ dvitīyam pi tṛtīyam pi yācitavyaṃ |  80. karma-kārakena karma kartavyaṃ |
tgt_original: 若未問者當更問，已問者默然。

src_original: śṛṇotu me bhante saṃgho iyaṃ dharmadinnā bhikṣuṇī |
tgt_original: 」是中尼戒師即時應僧中唱「大德尼僧聽！

src_original: tasyā itthan-nāmā ca itthan-nāmā ca antevāsinīyo upasaṃpādyāyo itthan-nāmā ca itthan-nāmā ca raho 'nuśāstāyo |  tāsām ihāgacchantīnāṃ syād brahmacaryāntarāyo tāhi itthan-nāmāya ca itthan-nāmāya ca dharmadinnāya upādhyāyinīya tatra sthitāhi ihasthitaḥ saṃgho upasaṃpadaṃ yācito |  anujñātā anujñāpakehi |  yācitā tāhi upādhyāyinī |
tgt_original: 式叉摩尼某甲，從和上尼某甲，求受具足戒。 某甲已從僧乞屬和上尼羯磨，和上尼某甲。

src_original: paripūrṇaṃ tāsāṃ pātra-cīvaraṃ |  deśita-śikṣāyo paripūrṇa-śikṣāyo sammatāyo viśuddhāyo bhikṣuṇīhi |  pariśuddhāyo antarāyikehi dharmehi ātmānaṃ pratijānanti |
tgt_original: 某甲自說清淨，無諸難事、年歲已滿、衣鉢具足，某甲和上尼某甲。

tgt_original: 某甲自說清淨，無諸難事、年歲已滿、衣鉢具足，某甲和上尼某甲。

src_original: paripurṇa-śikṣāyo |  sammatāyo viśuddhāyo bhikṣuṇīhi |
tgt_original: 僧今與某甲作屬和上尼羯磨，和上尼某甲。 諸尼僧忍與某甲作屬和上尼羯磨，和上尼某甲，忍者是長老默然；

src_original: tāyo saṃgho itthan-nāmāṃ ca itthan-nāmāṃ ca dharmadinnāya upādhyāyinīya ihasthito saṃgho upasaṃpādeti |  yeṣām āyuṣmatāṃ kṣamati itthan-nāmā ca itthan-nāmā ca dharmadinnāya upādhyāyinīya tatra-sthitāyo iha-sthitena saṃghena upasaṃpādi(dī)-[ya]mānāyo
tgt_original: 」如是三說「僧已忍為某甲作屬和上尼羯磨，和上尼某甲竟。

src_original: so tūṣṇīm asya |
tgt_original: 僧忍，默然故，是事如是持。
